statusLine.command: powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$input = [Console]::In.ReadToEnd(); try { $json = $input | ConvertFrom-Json; $modelName = $json.model.display_name; $currentDir = $json.workspace.current_dir; } catch { $modelName = 'Claude'; $currentDir = (Get-Location).Path; } $time = Get-Date -Format 'HH:mm:ss'; $user = $env:USERNAME; $computer = $env:COMPUTERNAME; $dirName = Split-Path -Leaf $currentDir; Write-Host \"$user@$computer [$time] $dirName | $modelName\""
